npcSpeech.text: You're awake! How are you feeling?

You don't remember! Wonderfuu... I mean what a shame. You must have blanked it all out... yes good... I mean a shame really but what can one do... There isn't much time, we aren't supposed to be here so late. I would suggest you keep moving.
Oh you must not remember... yes, that will work. All I can tell you is that you can trust me. I'm Presbyter. You should move on now.
It doesn't matter! Just go! Maybe take a few minutes to rest, but that's all we have!
That's only natural after what you went through... take a couple of minutes to rest but then you should go.
Great! I wish I could tell you more but I really can't, there's no time.
Look if anyone finds you in here we'll be in big trouble and all this risk will be for nothing. You need to leave.
You'll be fine. I know you are scared but you have a big role to play.
Believe me when I say the less you know the better it will be.
And don't tell anyone you were here.
